text: wja' jamaeat min 'ahya' alearab hawl (almdyn) yaetadhirun 'iilaa rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm, wybynwn lah ma hum fih min alduef wedm alqudrat ealaa alkhuruj llghzw, waqaead qawm bighayr edhr azhrwh jrat ealaa rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm. sayusib aladhin kafaruu min hwla' eadhab 'alim fi aldunya balqtl wghyrh, wafi alakhirat balnar
